item.title: 中国的住房救援在预示危机的城市落空
item.description:
在房价持续下跌的郑州，政府干预的局限性显而易见。【原文：

The limits of government intervention are evident in Zhengzhou, where home prices keep falling.

】

item.title: 亿万富翁保罗-辛格的继任计划备受关注
item.description:
对冲基金的日益壮大使其更难参与小型交易。这让人们对其伦敦办事处的作用以及保罗-辛格（Paul Singer）的最终接班人之争产生了疑问。【原文：

The hedge fund’s increasing heft is making it harder to pitch smaller deals. That raises questions about the role of its London office — and the contest to ultimately succeed Paul Singer.

】

item.title: 贝恩资本 17 亿美元收购要约遭 Insignia 拒绝
item.description: 澳大利亚财富管理公司 Insignia Financial Ltd. 拒绝了私募股权公司贝恩资本提出的 27 亿澳元（17 亿美元）收购要约。【原文：Australian wealth manager Insignia Financial Ltd. has rejected a A$2.7 billion ($1.7 billion) takeover offer from private equity firm Bain Capital.】

item.title: 债券交易员将 2025 年美联储降息目标定得比市场预期更深
item.description: 债券交易员一直在加大期权和期货赌注，认为美联储明年即将发出比市场预期更大幅度的降息信号。【原文：Bond traders have been boosting options and futures wagers that the Federal Reserve is about to signal deeper interest-rate cuts next year than the market anticipates.】

item.title: CommScope 与 Apollo 和 Monarch 达成协议，为 40 亿美元债务再融资
item.description: 电信基础设施公司 CommScope Holding Co. 周二发布新闻稿称，该公司与阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）和君主另类资本公司（Monarch Alternative Capital）牵头的债权人集团达成协议，为 2026 年到期的 43 亿美元债务进行再融资。【原文：Telecommunications infrastructure firm CommScope Holding Co. reached a deal with a group of creditors led by Apollo Global Management and Monarch Alternative Capital to refinance $4.3 billion of debt coming due by 2026, the company said in a press release on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大扩大空中边境监控以安抚特朗普
item.description: 加拿大正在部署一支所谓的 "空中情报特遣部队"，作为一项耗资 13 亿加元（约合 9.08 亿美元）的新计划的一部分，以解决美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对移民和芬太尼流经北部边境的担忧。【原文：Canada is deploying what it calls an “aerial intelligence task force” as part of a new C$1.3 billion ($908 million) plan to address US President-elect Donald Trump’s concerns about migrants and fentanyl flowing across the northern border.】

item.title: 特朗普上台前，芯片风险令日本博彩业股票大涨
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当选后，科技投资者希望减少对依赖中国的芯片制造设备公司的贸易不确定性的风险敞口，因此日本游戏股成为不大可能的赢家。【原文：Japanese gaming stocks are emerging as unlikely winners from Donald Trump’s election, as tech investors seek less exposure to trade uncertainties swirling around China-dependent chipmaking gear companies.】

item.title: 智利降息四分之一个百分点，警告通胀风险
item.description: 智利中央银行在连续第三次会议上将关键利率下调了四分之一个百分点，原因是通胀预测仍保持在目标水平，同时强调需要对进一步降息持谨慎态度。【原文：Chile’s central bank cut its key interest rate by a quarter point for the third meeting in a row as inflation forecasts remain anchored at target, while highlighting the need to be cautious about further reductions.】

item.title: 拜登将在未来几天内宣布对中国半导体进行调查
item.description: 乔-拜登总统的政府将在未来几天内启动对中国半导体的贸易调查，以推动减少对美国官员认为存在国家安全风险的技术的依赖。【原文：President Joe Biden’s administration is set to initiate a trade investigation into Chinese semiconductors in the coming days, as part of a push to reduce reliance on a technology that US officials believe pose national security risks.】

item.title: 纳斯达克 100 指数再次因巨型科技股而显得过于庞大
item.description: 在纳斯达克 100 指数中，全球最大的科技公司因规模过大而被削减规模仅一年后，本周该主要基准指数重新平衡时，它们可能会面临另一次修剪。【原文：Only a year after having their size clipped in the Nasdaq 100 because they got too big, the world’s largest technology companies may face another pruning when the marquee benchmark rebalances this week.】

item.title: BPM 银行要求意大利市场监管部门在联合信贷银行竞购后采取措施
item.description: 在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）上个月主动提出收购要约后，Banco BPM SpA 促请意大利市场监管机构 Consob 采取措施保护该银行的利益相关者。【原文：Banco BPM SpA urged Italy’s market regulator Consob to take measures to protect the bank’s stakeholders after UniCredit SpA’s unsolicited takeover bid last month.】

item.title: 澳大利亚成为摩根大通资产管理公司最青睐的债券市场新宠
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（J.P. Morgan Asset Management）的一位投资组合经理表示，欧洲政府债券的大行情即将结束，他现在打赌澳大利亚将是下一个表现出色的市场。【原文：The great run in European government bonds is coming to an end, according to a portfolio manager at J.P. Morgan Asset Management, who is now betting Australia will be the next market to outperform.】

item.title: 一月资本为私人信贷技术基金融资 8500 万美元
item.description: 新加坡资产管理公司 January Capital Pte Ltd. 在一份声明中说，该公司的成长型信贷基金在首轮投资者承诺中筹集了超过 8500 万美元。【原文：January Capital Pte Ltd., a Singapore-based asset manager, has raised over $85 million in an initial round of investor commitments for its growth credit fund, the company said in a statement.】

item.title: 巴西国会因社会问题考虑削弱卢拉的财政计划
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）削减开支计划中的一项重要内容将被淡化，原因是人们担心对一项社会计划的修改会伤害穷人。【原文：A key piece of Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s spending cut plan is set to be watered down over concerns that changes to a social program will hurt poor people, said the lawmaker in charge of presenting a new version of the bill in congress.】

item.title: 阿多纳赫获得 Stone Point 投资，估值达到 140 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Ardonagh 集团获得了 Stone Point Capital 的新投资，使这家英国保险经纪公司的估值在三年内几乎翻了一番，达到 140 亿美元。【原文：Ardonagh Group has secured new investment from Stone Point Capital, almost doubling the valuation of the UK insurance broker to $14 billion in three years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Dynamite 集团自上市以来首次盈利超过预期
item.description: Dynamite 集团在其作为上市公司的首份盈利报告中的表现超出了分析师的预期，并表示已经做好了应对贸易战的准备。【原文：Groupe Dynamite Inc. exceeded analyst expectations with its first earnings report as a public company and said it’s prepared to weather a trade war.】

item.title: E*Trade 计划推出只有平台客户才能购买的零成本基金
item.description: 摩根士丹利的 E*Trade 正计划推出一套免费基金，但有一个限制条件：只有经纪平台的客户才能购买这些基金。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s E*Trade is planning a suite of free funds, with a catch — only customers of the brokerage platform would be able to buy them.】

item.title: 支持加密货币的立法者希尔关注数字资产和银行监管
item.description: 在共和党人准备于 1 月份统一控制华盛顿之际，一个负责监督金融监管机构和华尔街的强大众议院小组将迎来一位新主席，他将加密货币和放松银行业监管作为其议程的重中之重。【原文：A powerful House panel overseeing financial regulators and Wall Street is set to gain a new chairman who has cryptocurrency and banking deregulation at the top of his agenda as Republicans prepare to take unified control of Washington in January.】

item.title: 两件事让美联储明天的决定变得棘手
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 塞内加尔考虑与投资者协商债务偿还期限
item.description: 在国家审计显示公共债务和赤字数字大于之前报告的数字之后，塞内加尔正在权衡与投资者接洽以延长债务期限。【原文：Senegal is weighing approaching investors to extend debt maturities after a state audit showed public debt and deficit figures were larger than previously reported.】

item.title: 维旺迪公司拆分后退出法国 CAC 40 指数，必维国际检验集团加入该指数
item.description: 巴黎泛欧交易所（Euronext）称，维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）将退出法国蓝筹股 CAC 40 指数。【原文：Vivendi SE will exit France’s blue-chip CAC 40 index, Paris bourse operator Euronext said, in a move that was expected after the media conglomerate split into four separate entities.】

item.title: IDG 资本被五角大楼从中国名单中剔除
item.description: 据美国国防部称，在北京和美国均设有办事处的风险投资公司 IDG Capital 已被五角大楼从与中国军方有联系的公司名单中除名。【原文：IDG Capital, a venture firm with offices in Beijing and the US, has been removed from a Pentagon list of companies with ties to the Chinese military, according to the US Department of Defense.】

item.title: 研究称北美电网停电风险正在上升
item.description: 据电网可靠性监管机构的一份报告称，由于电力需求激增和化石燃料发电厂的关闭，未来十年北美大部分地区停电的风险将增加。【原文：The risk of blackouts will increase for most of North America over the coming decade due to surging electricity demand and the closing of fossil-fuel power plants, according to a report by a grid reliability regulator.】

item.title: 尼玛-莫梅尼被判在旧金山谋杀鲍勃-李
item.description: 现金应用程序创始人鲍勃-李的一位熟人被认定于 2023 年 4 月在旧金山市中心的一条街道上谋杀了鲍勃-李，并可能面临终身监禁。【原文：An acquaintance of Cash App founder Bob Lee was found guilty of murdering him on a downtown San Francisco street in April 2023 and faces the possibility of life in prison.】

item.title: Meta 爱尔兰分公司因数据泄露被监管机构罚款 2.51 亿欧元
item.description: 爱尔兰数据保护委员会对 Meta Platforms 公司的爱尔兰分公司处以 2.51 亿欧元（约合 2.64 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：Ireland’s data protection commission fined Meta Platforms Inc.’s Irish arm €251 million ($264 million) following two inquiries into a personal data breach that it said impacted 29 million users worldwide.】

item.title: 国债收益率在本月高点附近停滞，降息预期升温
item.description: 在美联储预计于周三第三次降息之前，美国债券收益率的最新上升也增加了持有现金及等价物的成本。【原文：The latest increases in US bond yields — ahead of an expected third interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve on Wednesday — are also increasing the cost of remaining in cash and equivalents.】

item.title: 阿根廷阿空加瓜公司放眼全球债券市场，进军页岩领域
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，石油钻探公司 Petrolera Aconcagua Energia SA 正在寻求出售一笔国际债券，以抓住阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊推行自由市场改革后，阿根廷能源企业面临的机遇。【原文：Oil driller Petrolera Aconcagua Energia SA is looking to sell an international bond, swooping into an opening for Argentine energy corporates that’s materialized with President Javier Milei’s free-market reforms, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管欧佩克+延长减产，哈萨克斯坦仍计划增加石油产量
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦坚持其明年提高石油产量的计划，这可能会进一步加剧与欧佩克+伙伴国之间的紧张关系。【原文：Kazakhstan is sticking to its plan to raise oil output next year, potentially creating further tension with its OPEC+ partners.】

item.title: 西班牙聘请美国银行参与 CaixaBank 交易计划
item.description: 西班牙银行破产管理机构聘请美国银行公司帮助出售其在 CaixaBank SA 的部分股份，以抵消回购带来的影响。【原文：Spain’s bank resolution authority hired Bank of America Corp. to help sell some of its shares in CaixaBank SA and neutralize the impact of buybacks that would otherwise increase its stake.】

item.title: 尽管美国柴油进口量激增，欧洲柴油进口量仍将下降
item.description: 尽管来自美国的柴油进口量激增，但由于其他主要供应国的柴油进口量减少，欧洲 12 月份的柴油进口量将降至多个月来的最低点。【原文：Europe’s diesel imports are poised to drop to a multimonth low in December despite a surge in shipments from the US, as flows from other key suppliers dwindle.】
